summary: HAVE HAD 3 OF 4 TOWMAX TIRES!  THE FIRST TIRE GOT A BUBBLE IN IT AND WAS REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY, THE SECOND TIRE EXPANDED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED LAST SUMMER, THE THIRD TIRE LITERALLY FELL APART TOWING THIS PAST WEEKEND!  WE REPLACED THE FOURTH TIRE THIS WEEK, BECAUSE WE DIDN'T WANT ANY ISSUES TOWING!  WE HAVE DAMAGE TO THE THE RV FROM THE TIRE THAT BLOW OUT!!  WE CAN NOT FIND ANY INFORMATION ON WHO MAKES THE TOWMAX-POWER KING !

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 HEARTLAND SUNDANCE EQUIPPED WITH TOWMAX STR ST TIRES, SIZE: ST225/75 R15. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 62 MPH, THE DRIVER SIDE TIRE EXPLODED AND SHATTERED INTO PIECES WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT REPLACED THE TIRE THE NEXT DAY, AND THE REAR DRIVER SIDE TIRE EXPLODED AND SHATTERED INTO PIECES WITHOUT WARNING. THE DEALER REPLACED THE FOUR TIRES. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURES AND STATED THAT NOTHING COULD BE DONE. THE TIRE AND VEHICLE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 9,100.
TOW MAX SRT TIRES ARE BLOATED AND OUT OF ROUND AFTER 6K MILES, ONE BLEW OUT CAUSING RV DAMAGE. ALL FOUR ON RV FROM MANUFACTURE (HEARTLAND) ARE BLOATED AND HAD TO BE REPLACED AFTER ONLY 6K MILES.
